name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert SMITH a/k/a Robert Stith, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and LARSEN, JJ.
ROBERTS and MANDERINO, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert SMITH a/k/a Robert Stith, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of Sentence affirmed.
ROBERTS and MANDERINO, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ronald H. Isenberg, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward G. Rendell, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Glenn S. Gitomer, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
385 A.2d 972
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert SMITH a/k/a Robert Stith, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 12, 1978.
Decided May 15, 1978.
Ronald H. Isenberg, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward G. Rendell, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Glenn S. Gitomer, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and LARSEN, JJ.
